DataSourceDefinition.Name: REP-050
DataSourceDefinition.Expression: SELECT NVL(MAX(C01),0) + NVL(MAX(C02),0) + NVL(MAX(C03),0) + NVL(MAX(C04),0) + NVL(MAX(C05),0) + NVL(MAX(C06),0) + NVL(MAX(C07),0) + NVL(MAX(C08),0) + NVL(MAX(C09),0) + NVL(MAX(C10),0) + NVL(MAX(C11),0) + NVL(MAX(C12),0) + NVL(MAX(C13),0) + NVL(MAX(C14),0) + NVL(MAX(C15),0) + NVL(MAX(C16),0) + NVL(MAX(C17),0) + NVL(MAX(C18),0) AS ACUMULADO, MAX(C01) AS C01, MAX(C02) AS C02, MAX(C03) AS C03, MAX(C04) AS C04, MAX(C05) AS C05, MAX(C06) AS C06, MAX(C07) AS C07, MAX(C08) AS C08, MAX(C09) AS C09, MAX(C10) AS C10, MAX(C11) AS C11, MAX(C12) AS C12, MAX(C13) AS C13, MAX(C14) AS C14, MAX(C15) AS C15, MAX(C16) AS C16, MAX(C17) AS C17, MAX(C18) AS C18, DECODE(MAX(C01),NULL,0,1) AS IND_01, DECODE(MAX(C02),NULL,0,1) AS IND_02, DECODE(MAX(C03),NULL,0,1) AS IND_03, DECODE(MAX(C04),NULL,0,1) AS IND_04, DECODE(MAX(C05),NULL,0,1) AS IND_05, DECODE(MAX(C06),NULL,0,1) AS IND_06, DECODE(MAX(C07),NULL,0,1) AS IND_07, DECODE(MAX(C08),NULL,0,1) AS IND_08, DECODE(MAX(C09),NULL,0,1) AS IND_09, DECODE(MAX(C10),NULL,0,1) AS IND_10, DECODE(MAX(C11),NULL,0,1) AS IND_11, DECODE(MAX(C12),NULL,0,1) AS IND_12, DECODE(MAX(C13),NULL,0,1) AS IND_13, DECODE(MAX(C14),NULL,0,1) AS IND_14, DECODE(MAX(C15),NULL,0,1) AS IND_15, DECODE(MAX(C16),NULL,0,1) AS IND_16, DECODE(MAX(C17),NULL,0,1) AS IND_17, DECODE(MAX(C18),NULL,0,1) AS IND_18, DES_SUBG_VENT, DES_REGI, DES_ZONA, COD_TERR, COD_CLIE, NOMBRE_COMPLETO, PAIS, DIRECCION, TELEFONO, NUM_DOCU_IDEN, NIVEL, NUM_CONC, DESCRIPCION, PERIODO_INICIO, PERIODO_FIN, NRO_CORRELATIVO FROM ( select * from ( SELECT DECODE (SUBSTR(VAL_NOMB_PERI,-2),'01',SUM(puntos_totales),NULL) AS C01, DECODE (SUBSTR(VAL_NOMB_PERI,-2),'02',SUM(puntos_totales),NULL) AS C02, DECODE (SUBSTR(VAL_NOMB_PERI,-2),'03',SUM(puntos_totales),NULL) AS C03, DECODE (SUBSTR(VAL_NOMB_PERI,-2),'04',SUM(puntos_totales),NULL) AS C04, DECODE (SUBSTR(VAL_NOMB_PERI,-2),'05',SUM(puntos_totales),NULL) AS C05, DECODE (SUBSTR(VAL_NOMB_PERI,-2),'06',SUM(puntos_totales),NULL) AS C06, DECODE (SUBSTR(VAL_NOMB_PERI,-2),'07',SUM(puntos_totales),NULL) AS C07, DECODE (SUBSTR(VAL_NOMB_PERI,-2),'08',SUM(puntos_totales),NULL) AS C08, DECODE (SUBSTR(VAL_NOMB_PERI,-2),'09',SUM(puntos_totales),NULL) AS C09, DECODE (SUBSTR(VAL_NOMB_PERI,-2),'10',SUM(puntos_totales),NULL) AS C10, DECODE (SUBSTR(VAL_NOMB_PERI,-2),'11',SUM(puntos_totales),NULL) AS C11, DECODE (SUBSTR(VAL_NOMB_PERI,-2),'12',SUM(puntos_totales),NULL) AS C12, DECODE (SUBSTR(VAL_NOMB_PERI,-2),'13',SUM(puntos_totales),NULL) AS C13, DECODE (SUBSTR(VAL_NOMB_PERI,-2),'14',SUM(puntos_totales),NULL) AS C14, DECODE (SUBSTR(VAL_NOMB_PERI,-2),'15',SUM(puntos_totales),NULL) AS C15, DECODE (SUBSTR(VAL_NOMB_PERI,-2),'16',SUM(puntos_totales),NULL) AS C16, DECODE (SUBSTR(VAL_NOMB_PERI,-2),'17',SUM(puntos_totales),NULL) AS C17, DECODE (SUBSTR(VAL_NOMB_PERI,-2),'18',SUM(puntos_totales),NULL) AS C18, DES_SUBG_VENT, DES_REGI, DES_ZONA, COD_TERR, cod_clie, nombre_completo, pais, direccion || (SELECT z1.des_geog || ' ' || z2.des_geog || ' ' || z3.des_geog || ' ' || z4.des_geog AS descripcion FROM zon_valor_estru_geopo z1, zon_valor_estru_geopo z2, zon_valor_estru_geopo z3, zon_valor_estru_geopo z4 WHERE z1.orde_1 = orden_1 AND z1.orde_2 IS NULL AND z2.orde_1 = orden_1 AND z2.orde_2 = orden_2 AND z2.orde_3 IS NULL AND z3.orde_1 = orden_1 AND z3.orde_2 = orden_2 AND z3.orde_3 = orden_3 AND z3.orde_4 IS NULL AND z4.orde_1 = orden_1 AND z4.orde_2 = orden_2 AND z4.orde_3 = orden_3 AND z4.orde_4 = orden_4 AND z4.orde_5 IS NULL AND z1.pais_oid_pais = oid_pais AND z2.pais_oid_pais = oid_pais AND z3.pais_oid_pais = oid_pais AND z4.pais_oid_pais = oid_pais ) direccion, telefono, NUM_DOCU_IDEN, nivel, num_conc, descripcion, periodo_inicio, periodo_fin, DENSE_RANK() OVER (PARTITION BY PAIS, num_conc, descripcion, nivel ORDER BY cod_clie ASC) AS nro_correlativo FROM ( SELECT subg.DES_SUBG_VENT, par_gen.oid_para_gral, reg.DES_REGI, zon.DES_ZONA, ter.COD_TERR, cli.cod_clie, gen_pais.pais, cli.VAL_NOM1||' '||cli.VAL_APE1||' '||cli.VAL_APE2 AS nombre_completo, CLI_DIRE.DIRECCION, CLI_TEL.TELEFONO, cli_id.NUM_DOCU_IDEN,cc_pun.OID_CUEN_CORR_PUNT, cc_pun.TMOV_OID_TIPO_MOVI, cc_pun.NUM_PUNT, cc_pun.clie_oid_clie, CASE WHEN cc_pun.TMOV_OID_TIPO_MOVI = 1 OR ( cc_pun.TMOV_OID_TIPO_MOVI = 2 AND ( cc_pun.val_desc = 'Cargo por Anulación') ) OR cc_pun.TMOV_OID_TIPO_MOVI = 3 THEN cc_pun.NUM_PUNT ELSE 0 END AS puntos_totales, niv_pre.NUM_NIVE AS nivel, par_gen.NUM_CONC, par_gen.val_nomb AS descripcion, per_ini.val_nomb_peri AS periodo_inicio, per_fin.val_nomb_peri AS periodo_fin, per.val_nomb_peri, ( SELECT zn.orde_1 FROM zon_valor_estru_geopo zn WHERE zn.oid_valo_estr_geop = ter.VEPO_OID_VALO_ESTR_GEOP ) orden_1, ( SELECT zn.orde_2 FROM zon_valor_estru_geopo zn WHERE zn.oid_valo_estr_geop = ter.VEPO_OID_VALO_ESTR_GEOP ) orden_2, ( SELECT zn.orde_3 FROM zon_valor_estru_geopo zn WHERE zn.oid_valo_estr_geop = ter.VEPO_OID_VALO_ESTR_GEOP ) orden_3, ( SELECT zn.orde_4 FROM zon_valor_estru_geopo zn WHERE zn.oid_valo_estr_geop = ter.VEPO_OID_VALO_ESTR_GEOP ) orden_4, par_gen.pais_oid_pais oid_pais FROM INC_CONCU_PARAM_GENER par_gen, INC_PARAM_GENER_PREMI gen_pre, CRA_PERIO per_ini, CRA_PERIO per_fin, INC_PARAM_NIVEL_PREMI niv_pre, INC_CUENT_CORRI_PUNTO cc_pun, MAE_CLIEN_UNIDA_ADMIN un_adm, MAE_CLIEN cli, MAE_CLIEN_IDENT cli_id, ZON_TERRI_ADMIN ter_adm, ZON_TERRI ter, ZON_SECCI sec, ZON_ZONA zon, ZON_REGIO reg, ZON_SUB_GEREN_VENTA subg, CRA_PERIO per, ( SELECT val_oid, val_i18n pais FROM v_gen_i18n_sicc WHERE attr_enti = 'SEG_PAIS' AND idio_oid_idio = 1 )gen_pais, ( SELECT cc.CLIE_OID_CLIE, cc.VAL_TEXT_COMU AS telefono FROM MAE_CLIEN_COMUN cc, mae_tipo_comun t_com WHERE cc.TICM_OID_TIPO_COMU = t_com.OID_TIPO_COMU AND t_com.COD_TIPO_COMU = 'TF' AND cc.IND_COMU_PPAL = 1 ) CLI_TEL, (SELECT cd.clie_oid_clie, DECODE (tvia.des_abrv_tipo_via, NULL, '', tvia.des_abrv_tipo_via || ' ' ) || DECODE (cd.val_nomb_via, NULL, '', cd.val_nomb_via || ' ' ) || DECODE (cd.num_ppal, NULL, '', cd.num_ppal || ' ' ) || DECODE (cd.val_obse, NULL, '', cd.val_obse || ' ' ) || DECODE (estrgeo.des_geog, NULL, '', estrgeo.des_geog || ' ' ) AS direccion FROM mae_clien_direc cd, seg_tipo_via tvia, zon_terri terri, zon_valor_estru_geopo estrgeo WHERE cd.tivi_oid_tipo_via = tvia.oid_tipo_via AND cd.ind_dire_ppal = 1 and cd.ind_elim <> 1 AND cd.terr_oid_terr = terri.oid_terr AND terri.vepo_oid_valo_estr_geop = estrgeo.oid_valo_estr_geop) cli_dire WHERE par_gen.OID_PARA_GRAL = gen_pre.COPA_OID_PARA_GRAL AND par_gen.PERD_OID_PERI_DESD = per_ini.oid_peri AND par_gen.PERD_OID_PERI_HAST = per_fin.oid_peri AND niv_pre.PAGP_OID_PARA_GENE_PREM = gen_pre.OID_PARA_GENE_PREM AND ( SELECT 1 AS TITO FROM INC_GANAD GAN WHERE GAN.PANP_OID_PARA_NIVE_PREM = NIV_PRE.OID_PARA_NIVE_PREM AND GAN.CLIE_OID_CLIE = UN_ADM.CLIE_OID_CLIE AND ROWNUM = 1 ) = 1 AND un_adm.clie_oid_clie = cli.oid_clie AND cli.oid_clie = cli_id.CLIE_OID_CLIE(+) AND cli_id.VAL_IDEN_DOCU_PRIN = 1 AND cli.oid_clie = CLI_DIRE.CLIE_OID_CLIE(+) AND cli.oid_clie = CLI_TEL.clie_oid_clie(+) AND cc_pun.COPA_OID_PARA_GRAL = par_gen.OID_PARA_GRAL AND cc_pun.CLIE_OID_CLIE = CLI.oid_clie AND un_adm.IND_ACTI = 1 AND un_adm.ZTAD_OID_TERR_ADMI = ter_adm.OID_TERR_ADMI AND ter_adm.ZSCC_OID_SECC = sec.OID_SECC AND sec.ZZON_OID_ZONA = zon.OID_ZONA AND zon.ZORG_OID_REGI = reg.OID_REGI AND reg.ZSGV_OID_SUBG_VENT = subg.OID_SUBG_VENT AND cc_pun.PERD_OID_PERI = per.oid_peri AND ter_adm.TERR_OID_TERR = ter.OID_TERR %start_TERRITORIOVALUES% AND ter_adm.TERR_OID_TERR IN (%value_TERRITORIOVALUES%) %end_TERRITORIOVALUES% %start_SUBGERENCIAVENTAVALUES% AND subg.OID_SUBG_VENT IN (%value_SUBGERENCIAVENTAVALUES%) %end_SUBGERENCIAVENTAVALUES% %start_REGIONVALUES% AND reg.oid_regi IN (%value_REGIONVALUES%) %end_REGIONVALUES% %start_ZONAVALUES% AND zon.OID_ZONA IN (%value_ZONAVALUES%) %end_ZONAVALUES% AND par_gen.oid_para_gral IN (%value_NUMEROCONCURSOVALUES%) AND par_gen.pais_oid_pais IN (%value_PAISVALUES%) AND par_gen.pais_oid_pais = gen_pais.val_oid(+) AND niv_pre.oid_para_nive_prem IN (%value_NIVELESCONCURSOVALUES%) ) GROUP BY DES_SUBG_VENT, DES_REGI, DES_ZONA, COD_TERR, cod_clie, nombre_completo, pais, direccion, telefono, NUM_DOCU_IDEN, nivel, num_conc, descripcion, periodo_inicio, periodo_fin, val_nomb_peri, ORDEN_1,ORDEN_2,ORDEN_3,ORDEN_4, OID_PAIS ORDER BY pais, num_conc, descripcion, DES_SUBG_VENT, DES_REGI, DES_ZONA, COD_TERR, cod_clie, nombre_completo ASC ) ) GROUP BY DES_SUBG_VENT, DES_REGI, DES_ZONA, COD_TERR, cod_clie, nombre_completo, pais, direccion, telefono, NUM_DOCU_IDEN, nivel, num_conc, descripcion, periodo_inicio, periodo_fin, NRO_CORRELATIVO
